intro: Lophiaris splendida f. holoxantha, commonly known as the splendid lophiaris var. holoxantha, is a rare and unique variant of the lophiaris genus. It is a flowering plant native to specific regions in South Africa, characterized by its striking, showy inflorescences. The plant features lance-shaped leaves and produces clusters of bright yellow flowers that bloom in spring. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its vibrant color and distinctive appearance. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a conservation concern.
